name: Lunistice Demo
description:
Lunistice is coming soon and can be wishlisted here

Lunistice is a 3D Platformer created with simple but fun gameplay and a cute PS1/SEGA Saturn inspired artstyle in mind. Take the role of Hana the Tanuki and jump and fight through her dreams! What secrets await her on the moon - her final destination?
Lunistice features a retro look heavily inspired by early 90s 3D graphics with bouncy enemies and a fluffy heroine.
QU5EIEFUVEVOVElWRSBQTEFZRVJTIE1JR0hUIEZJTkQgT1VUIE1PUkUgQUJPVVQgVEhFIExVTklTV

Run, jump and grind your way through seven different dreams with two levels each! Maybe, if you look hard enough, you may be able to piece together Hana’s story on the way. You can also test your skills in Speedrun Mode, where you are able to play through the game as Hana or four different guest characters from other indie games as fast as possible!

Features:
  • It's really affordable!
  • Experience 7 different dreams!
  • QU5EIE9ORSBOSUdIVE1BUkU=
  • Test your skills in the included Speedrun Mode and play as characters from other games!
  • ...and enjoy the good vibes and retro A E S T H E T I C S
